name: BodhiBuildingIntelligence
0:
”Alexa, turn on the entry light.”
”Alexa, set the thermostat to seventy-two degrees.”
”Alexa, close the blackout shade.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can use Alexa to control devices that are part of the Bodhi Platform. You can control lights, shades, blinds, thermostats, and televisions! This skill requires a Bodhi Account and permission to configure Alexa Accounts on the Platform. Only Alexa Accounts created on the Bodhi Platform should be used for linking. Limited to the US Region.
